title: Lambs & Ivy Woodland Friends Crib Bedding Set - 4 Pieces
description: Create a charming and inviting nursery with the Lambs & Ivy Woodland Friends Crib Bedding Set. This 4-piece set includes a beautifully designed quilt featuring woodland animals, a fitted crib sheet adorned with trees and critters, a crib skirt with a playful forest scene, and a soft bumper with whimsical forest friends. The bedding is crafted from high-quality cotton fabric for softness and durability. Each piece features adorable woodland creatures in a color palette of greens, blues, and browns, bringing the beauty of the forest into your baby's room. The set is machine washable for easy care, making it a practical choice for busy parents.
key_features: Includes Quilt, Sheet, Skirt, and Bumper

title: Lambs & Ivy Woodland Friends Crib Bedding Set - Adorable Forest Theme
description: Transform your nursery into a serene woodland retreat with the Lambs & Ivy Woodland Friends Crib Bedding Set. This set features a delightful mix of forest animals like owls, foxes, and deer, set against a backdrop of trees and flowers. The set includes a cozy quilt, a soft and durable fitted crib sheet, a crib skirt with a charming forest design, and a plush bumper for added safety and comfort. Made from soft, high-quality cotton, this bedding set is gentle on your baby's skin and durable enough for everyday use. The bedding is easy to clean, making it a convenient choice for busy parents.
key_features: 4-Piece Set Includes Quilt, Sheet, Skirt, and Bumper
